title: MSBuildEngineLogger test fails on CoreCLR with DuplicateProjectSwitchError
body: This test (in `Microsoft.Build.CommandLine.UnitTests.dll`) is failing with what looks like a misinterpretation of the command line somewhere in `MSBuildApp.Execute`.

nodes.body: @cdmihai Can you take a look at this?  It seems likely to be self-contained and a good way to start debugging through .NET Core code and figuring out the internals of MSBuild.
